title: Foreign fighters Aiden Aslin, Shaun Pinner and Brahim Saadoune sentenced in Donetsk
content:
1. Foreign fighters Aiden Aslin, Shaun Pinner and Brahim Saadoune sentenced in Donetsk  The Washington Post
  2. Britons sentenced to death after ‘show trial’ in Russian-occupied Ukraine  The Guardian
  3. Two Britons and a Moroccan sentenced to death by pro-Russian court in separatist part of Ukraine  CNN
  4. It was only a matter of time before Russia took British hostages  The Independent
  5. West Denounces Death Sentences for 3 Who Fought for Ukraine  U.S. News & World Report
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
